Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an affordable housing fund and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an affordable housing fund in relation to benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an affordable housing fund and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an affordable housing fund in relation to benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an affordable housing fund and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an affordable housing fund in relation to benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an affordable housing fund and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an affordable housing fund in relation to benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to approve, an extension of the 421-a tax incentive program that requires longer term affordability of units for low and middle-income New Yorkers by extending the benefit period.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Extension of the 421-a tax incentive program that requires longer term affordability of units for low and middle-income New Yorkers by extending the benefit period.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to approve, an extension of the 421-a tax incentive program that requires longer term affordability of units for low and middle-income New Yorkers by extending the benefit period.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Extension of the 421-a tax incentive program that requires longer term affordability of units for low and middle-income New Yorkers by extending the benefit period.
